name: A Visit to the Library
description:
Made for the One Minute Jam in November 2021.

The library is closing. You have sixty seconds to get out.

Will you leave? Will you stay? Who knows?

- Game has two (ish) endings!

- The library has several secrets/hidden things. It is recommended to look around and try to find these things for fun.

- Took about 12h of development.

- All models/textures/VA/art made by me, Theodor Holmberg.
